description: Cycle through the scenic nature reserve of Rieselfelder, home to diverse bird species and wetlands.

locationInfo.description: A well-maintained cycling trail through wetlands and birdwatching spots.
safetyTips: Wear a helmet and bright clothing.
Respect nature and avoid disturbing wildlife.
Carry a small repair kit for emergencies.

description: Stroll through Münster’s botanical garden and discover exotic plants and quiet spots for relaxation.

locationInfo.description: A beautifully maintained botanical garden with themed plant sections and peaceful seating areas.
safetyTips: Do not pick or touch rare plants.
Bring a camera for capturing unique flowers.

description: Enjoy a peaceful rowboat ride on Aasee with stunning views of the city skyline and nature.
groupSuitability: Great for a relaxing water experience

locationInfo.description: A calm lake perfect for boating, surrounded by lush greenery and walking paths.
safetyTips: Wear a life jacket for safety.
Be aware of changing weather conditions.

description: Capture Münster’s historic charm on a photography walk through the artistic district of Kuhviertel.

locationInfo.description: A picturesque district with cobbled streets, historic pubs, and unique architecture.
safetyTips: Keep your camera safe from unexpected weather.
Respect private property when taking photos.
Look for interesting light and shadow contrasts.

description: Practice a guided yoga session in the serene atmosphere of Südpark, surrounded by greenery.

locationInfo.description: A peaceful city park with open green spaces, ideal for yoga and meditation.
safetyTips: Bring a yoga mat for comfort.
Stay hydrated and dress in comfortable layers.
Find a quiet spot away from crowded areas.
